en_comments: Shortage in private market due to an increase in demand in addition to delay caused by a temporary bottleneck in filling & packaging operations for the product. No supply impact to the public market.
fr_comments:
Pénurie sur le marché privé due à une augmentation de la demande et à un retard causé par un engorgement temporaire dans le remplissage et le conditionnement du produit.
Aucun impact sur l'approvisionnement du marché public.

fr_ingredients: Vaccin polysaccharidique capsulaire vi contre salmonella typhi

Shortage due to short term supply - demand imbalance

La rupture d'approvisionnement est due à un déséquilibre temporaire entre l'offre et la demande

shortage_reason.en_reason: Delay in shipping of the drug.
shortage_reason.fr_reason: Retard dans l’expédition du médicament

en_comments:
Kit for the Preparation of Technetium Tc 99m Sestamibi Injection has been depleted prior to release of the next lot. Inventory replenishment is expected by Tuesday, Apr 4, 2023.
We understand the inconvenience this may cause you and apologize for the disruption.
fr_comments:
Le kit pour la préparation de l'injection de technétium Tc 99m Sestamibi a été épuisé avant la sortie du lot suivant. Le réapprovisionnement des stocks est prévu d'ici le mardi 4 avril 2023.
Nous comprenons les désagréments que cela peut vous causer et nous nous excusons pour la perturbation.

en_comments:
SKYRIZI 75mg/0.83 mL (90 mg/mL) pre-filled syringe format is slowly being depleted and is no longer available to order.

For several months now, SKYRIZI has been available in two other formats – a 150 mg/1 mL (150 mg/mL) pre-filled pen or a 150 mg/1 mL (150 mg/mL) syringe for order.

The decision of discontinuation was made at the end of 2024. AbbVie no longer intends to be meeting demand and this drug will be discontinued.
fr_comments:
SKYRIZI 75mg/0.83 mL (90 mg/mL) pre-filled syringe format is slowly being depleted and is no longer available to order.

For several months now, SKYRIZI has been available in two other formats – a 150 mg/1 mL (150 mg/mL) pre-filled pen or a 150 mg/1 mL (150 mg/mL) syringe for order.
